channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: ISS Loses 4 Astronauts Overnight. Can This Skeleton Crew Keep It Running?
item.description: There are only three astronauts left on the International Space Station now that Crew-11 is back on Earth. Should we be worried?

item.title: Piratage des matchs de Ligue 1 : la justice impose aux VPN de bloquer de nouveaux sites
item.description: Les fournisseurs de VPN sont une fois de plus tenus de bloquer plusieurs noms de domaine diffusant illégalement des compétitions sportives en France. Cette fois, c'est la Ligue de football professionnel (LFP) qui est allée au charbon auprès du tribunal judiciaire de Paris, avec succès.

item.title: OpenAI invests in Sam Altman’s brain computer interface startup Merge Labs
item.description: OpenAI is participating in a $250 million seed round into Merge Labs, Sam Altman's brain computer interface startup. The startup is valued at $850 million.

item.title: "No meaningful changes" – Venezuelans still need a VPN to access X
item.description: Digital rights group debunks rumors that the X ban has been lifted in Venezuela and confirms that there has not been any meaningful changes to the country's internet censorship practices since Maduro's capture.

item.title: Wikimedia announces AI partners including Meta and Microsoft
item.description: As part of Wikipedia's 25th anniversary, parent company Wikimedia announced a slew of partnerships with AI-focused companies like Amazon, Meta, Perplexity, Microsoft and others. The deals are meant to alleviate some of the cost associated with AI chatbots accessing Wikipedia content in enormous volumes by giving the tech companies streamlined access. As noted by The Verge, the timeline on these deals is a little squirrely. The Wikipedia foundation says that several companies became enterprise partners "over the past year," while listing Amazon, Google and Meta as "existing" partners. It appea...

item.title: Look out Mint - Metro by T-Mobile's new deal gets you an unlimited data plan for just $25 per month
item.description: Metro by T-Mobile has just debuted its best-ever batch of deals for new customers this week, with seriously cheap plans across the board.

item.title: Indie RPG Sea of Stars hits iOS and Android on April 7
item.description: The indie RPG Sea of Stars is being released for mobile platforms on April 7. The iOS and Android versions are priced at just $10, which is a steal considering it cost $35 when it was first released for PC and consoles. Heck, it still costs that much on many platforms. This is a mobile release, so it's not an exact port. The interface has been revamped to allow for complete touch control. It's also compatible with controllers, which is always a good thing with smartphone ports. The Android version has a couple of unique features. It offers Google Play Games achievements and cloud saves across ...

item.title: Valerion généralise la fonction anti-arc-en-ciel sur toute sa gamme de vidéoprojecteurs
item.description: Le vidéoprojecteur Valerion VisionMaster Max dispose d’une fonction particulièrement intéressante pour les personnes qui sont sensibles aux effets arc-en-ciel produits par les modèles DLP. Désormais, via une mise à jour, tous les vidéoprojecteurs de la marque vont en profiter.

item.title: Big OpenAI leak claims the ChatGPT maker is developing an earbud-style wearable with a surprising twist
item.description: OpenAI’s next wearable looks like Apple’s AirPods and will give you constant access to ChatGPT.

item.title: Animal Crossing New Horizons : la version Switch 2 améliore grandement ces deux points
item.description: L'opus Switch d'Animal Crossing sorti en 2020 a droit à une version remis au goût du jour pour la Switch 2. Et il y a une vraie différence.

item.title: ASUS has stopped producing the RTX 5070 Ti and 5060 Ti 16GB, saying they've reached 'end of life'
item.description: YouTube channel Hardware Unboxed is reporting that NVIDIA has “effectively” discontinued the RTX 5070 Ti and 5060 Ti 16GB due to the ongoing memory crunch. In its most recent video, the channel states ASUS “explicitly” told it the RTX 5070 Ti is “currently facing a supply shortage.” As a result, the company has “placed the model into end of life status,” and no longer plans to produce it. Hardware Unboxed also spoke to retailers in Australia, who told the channel the 5070 Ti is “no longer available to purchase from partners and distributors,” adding they expect that to be the case throughout a...

item.title: En 2026, le jeu vidéo sur Linux va faire un bond de géant en ray tracing
item.description: Et si vous jouiez en ray tracing sur Linux ? La communauté s'active pour optimiser très nettement les performances des jeux modernes, y compris sur Unreal Engine 5.

item.title: 2016 is back in fashion — here are the phones we were using for Vine, Snapchat filters, and Pokemon Go
item.description: The web is alive with the sound of 2016 nostalgia – let’s take a look back at the best phones of our favorite era.

item.title: JBL Charge 6 : cette référence des enceintes Bluetooth est à son plus bas prix pour les soldes d’hiver
item.description: La JBL Charge 6 est une excellente enceinte Bluetooth que vous retrouvez à 138,60 euros sur Boulanger pendant les soldes d'hiver 2026, grâce à un code promo, contre 199,99 euros à son lancement.

item.title: Connectivity issues? Mullvad’s OpenVPN shutdown is happening today – here's all you need to do to keep using the VPN
item.description: Mullvad has officially taken its OpenVPN servers offline, ending support for the legacy protocol and pushing all users to WireGuard. Here's what you need to know.

item.title: Over 100 episodes of classic Sesame Street have arrived on YouTube
item.description: YouTube is now home to the "largest digital library of Sesame Street content" with the arrival of over a hundred older, "classic" episodes of the show, as first announced last year. YouTube's collection of Sesame Street episodes spans the series' history, as the announcement for the streaming launch mentions: "More than 100 full Sesame Street […]

item.title: IKEA's official color of 2026 is Rebel Pink — and here are 21 ways to add this modern rosy hue to your kitchen
item.description: Add an unexpected splash of modern blush pink to your kitchen for a touch of warmth.

item.title: Climate Hacking Could Cool the Planet, but Our Oceans Might Pay the Price
item.description: Climate engineering would alter the oceans, reshaping marine life. A new study examines the risks.

item.title: Microsoft Copilot AI attack took just a single click to compromise users - here's what we know
item.description: Varonis uncovers a new way to carry out prompt injection attacks, forcing Microsoft into a quick fix.

item.title: I've waited 10 long years for the Sony FE 100mm f/2.8 Macro GM OSS, and it's the 5-star optic to delight Sony macro photographers
item.description: The Sony FE 100mm f/2.8 Macro GM OSS is the update to its 10-year-old predecessor, and it's the lens Sony macro lovers have been dreaming of.

item.title: Un cloud souverain pour l’Europe… opéré par l’américain Amazon
item.description: Un cloud souverain européen peut-il être… américain ? C'est la quadrature du cercle qu'Amazon Web Services tente de résoudre avec l'annonce d'une nouvelle infrastructure indépendante et hébergée au sein de l'Union européenne, loin des yeux d'un Oncle Sam avec qui la confiance est rompue.

item.title: Samsung casse les prix pendant la 2e démarque : les 16 offres qui valent le coup
item.description: Les appareils Samsung ne sont pas épargnés pendant la deuxième démarque des soldes. Envie d'un nouveau TV QLED stylé ? Un smartphone à clapet ou bien d'un écran Ultra Wide OLED ? C'est ce qu'on retrouve dans cette sélection de produit du géant sud-coréen.

item.title: The Dead Jon Snow Show May Live Once More
item.description: Fitting thing for a Jon Snow show to do, honestly.

item.title: The next Subway Surfers game comes out in February
item.description: Subway Surfers City, a follow-up to the popular endless runner mobile game / sludge content star Subway Surfers, will be launching on February 26th on iOS and Android, with preregistration open now. "Building upon the original title, Subway Surfers City brings players home from the franchise's World Tour and into the heart of the Subway […]

item.title: Amazon reveals perfect first photo of Sophie Turner as Lara Croft as filming on its Tomb Raider TV show begins
item.description: Tomb Raider fans have walked back on their criticism of Sophie Turner playing Lara Croft after Amazon released the show's first official image.

item.title: How to watch A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms from anywhere in the world with this VPN deal
item.description: Here's how to watch A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms from anywhere in the world with this mega VPN deal.

item.title: Is Starlink authoritarian-proof?
item.description: The Iranian protests are just the latest global conflict where Elon Musk’s Starlink has become a vital communication conduit. But will the service always hold up in the face of authoritarian regimes—and to Musk’s whims? Satellite communications networks have proved resilient amid a crackdown.

item.title: ‘This credit isn’t meant to make up for what happened. No credit really can’: Verizon is offering a $20 credit after its major outage — but will it be enough?
item.description: Verizon experienced a massive outage on January 14, 2026, lasting more than 8 hours across the United States. The carrier is now apologizing and offering a $20 credit, but is that enough for impacted customers?

item.title: This viral smart scale has over 350,000 five-star reviews on Amazon — and it's on sale for only $19.99
item.description: The viral Renpho smart scale is feature-packed with over 350,000 positive reviews on Amazon, and it's on sale for only $19.99.

item.title: The best budget smartphone you can buy
item.description: Some of us take a kind of “I eat to live” rather than an “I live to eat” approach to gadgets. They’re tools that help you get things done, not something you want to invest a lot of time or money in. If that’s you — and there’s no judgment here from a certifiable gadget […]

item.title: Rockstar has seemingly shut down the Bully Online mod that went viral last month — 'Know this was not something we wanted', dev says
item.description: One month after launch, the viral Bully Online mod has been shut down, seemingly at the order of Rockstar Games.

item.title: Here's everything we know about the Samsung S95H OLED, the successor to our 2025 TV of the Year
item.description: Everything we know about the Samsung S95H, the 2026 flagship OLED TV that Samsung revealed at CES.

item.title: Asus ROG Kithara : un casque gaming vraiment audiophile ?
item.description: Présenté au CES 2026, le ROG Kithara marque une nouvelle incursion d'Asus dans le segment des casques gaming audiophiles. Fruit d'une collaboration avec le spécialiste Hifiman, ce modèle filaire adopte des composants haut de gamme pour offrir une qualité sonore digne d'un équipement haute-fidélité.

item.title: Cette caravane hybride promet de régler le plus gros problème des voitures électriques
item.description: Présentée au CES 2026 de Las Vegas, la première caravane d'Evotrex promet de révolutionner le camping-car avec son système hybride plutôt intéressant. Assistée par un moteur électrique et équipée d'une imposante batterie, elle affiche des ambitions démesurées...

item.title: ExpressVPN finally launches a business VPN to take on NordLayer
item.description: ExpressVPN for Teams is designed to help small and medium-sized businesses secure their remote workforce with centralized management and dedicated IPs.

item.title: Verizon will pay you $20 following its nationwide outage — here’s how to get it
item.description: Verizon is offering customers a $20 account credit following a massive outage that brought down service across the US on Wednesday. In an update on X, Verizon says you'll receive a text message when the credit is available, which you can redeem by logging into the myVerizon app and accepting it. "Yesterday, we did not […]

item.title: Spotify is raising its prices to $13 a month for US users, the third price hike in three years
item.description: There's another Spotify price hike on the way, and we can't say we're entirely surprised.

item.title: Dietary supplements recalled after salmonella outbreak sickens dozens of people across 21 states
item.description: The outbreak is linked to products sold on digital platforms like Amazon and Walmart, with the FDA warning that more products could be affected. The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) is investigating a salmonella outbreak linked to dietary supplement powder that left 45 people sick and a dozen people hospitalized across the country.

item.title: More than 100 classic episodes of Sesame Street are now streaming on YouTube and YouTube Kids
item.description: If you’re looking for something to entertain your kids for the next several months (and potentially longer), YouTube would like you to know that more than 100 classic episodes of Sesame Street are now streaming on the platform. The partnership between Sesame Street creator Sesame Workshop and YouTube was first announced last year and encompasses both old episodes as well as new content. Some of the themed compilations that have also been added to YouTube and YouTube Kids focus on specific educational topics such as ABCs and STEM, while others have broader themes like “Adventure & Imagination” ...

item.title: CIOs don’t need more AI—they need AI that actually understands their business
item.description: Why copilots stall and context-aware AI is essential for real enterprise decision-making.

item.title: Wikimedia Foundation announces new AI partnerships with Amazon, Meta, Microsoft, Perplexity and others
item.description: The AI partnerships allow companies to access the org's content, like Wikipedia, at scale.

item.title: Streaming en vol : Air France et Apple TV+ signent un accord inédit
item.description: Air France profite de son déploiement Starlink pour frapper fort : un partenariat avec Apple TV+ permettant de streamer en haute définition à 10 000 mètres d'altitude.

item.title: Intel prépare sa revanche sur AMD : deux nouvelles gammes arrivent dès mars 2026
item.description: Intel prépare un printemps très animé sur le front des processeurs grand public. Deux nouvelles gammes desktop, pensées comme des armes de retour face à AMD, seraient prêtes à débarquer dès mars ou avril : les Core Ultra 200K Plus et 200HX Plus, alias Arrow Lake Refresh.

item.title: 25 ans de Wikipedia : malgré les questions sur l’avenir, les Français restent accros
item.description: À l’occasion de ses 25 ans, Wikipédia dresse le bilan de son rôle dans l’accès au savoir et s’interroge sur son avenir. Confiance du public, indépendance économique, intelligence artificielle, démocratie et nouveaux partenariats. L’encyclopédie se projette vers les 25 prochaines années.

item.title: Windows Server 2008 is finally gone, after Microsoft pulls support at last
item.description: Microsoft has ended all support (ESU and PA) for Windows Vista and Windows Server 2008, and we mean all support.

item.title: Ricoh’s black-and-white-only camera launches in February for $2,200
item.description: The Ricoh GR IV Monochrome now has a price and is already up for preorder. The dedicated black-and-white camera, based on the standard GR IV with a fixed 28mmm-equivalent lens, will cost $2,199.95 - a $700 premium over the GR IV. Ricoh first announced the GR IV Monochrome was being made back in October, and […]

item.title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms was almost the first Game of Thrones movie, the show's creator says — and it nearly happened because of George R.R. Martin
item.description: The new Game of Thrones show's creator explains why it won't be released all at once – and how it almost saw the light of day as a movie instead.

item.title: The Sony Bravia 8 II is a TV enthusiast’s dream
item.description: Sony has a history of making excellent TVs, from the Trinitron CRTs of last century to the world's first OLED nearly 20 years ago to 2016's ZD9 mini-LED that delivered exceptional brightness and dimming control for the time. And while Samsung beat Sony to the market with the S95B, in 2022 Sony was the first […]

item.title: Here’s Your First Look at Sophie Turner’s Lara Croft
item.description: Amazon's 'Tomb Raider' series, created by Phoebe Waller-Bridge of 'Fleabag' fame, is currently in production.

item.title: Mentra’s first smart glasses are open-source and come with their own app store
item.description: Mentra will soon start shipping its first smart glasses, the Mentra Live. At first glance, there’s nothing obvious setting Mentra’s glasses apart from its more well-known competitors, but they come with their own dedicated app store, and employ an open-source OS with an SDK that developers have had access to since early 2025. Mentra says the MiniApp Store is the first app store of its nature for smart glasses, and it will be available to iOS and Android users through the Mentra app. It might be a bit of a reach to call it the smartphone-ification of smart glasses at this early stage, but that ...

item.title: Samsung’s refreshed Mobile Gaming Hub is trying to make it easier to discover new games
item.description: During CES 2026, Samsung unveiled plenty of new TVs, monitors and other hardware. However, the company is also looking to expand further into video games and has announced a significant refresh to its Gaming Hub on smartphones. Engadget spoke with Samsung’s Jong Woo, VP of Game Services, who explained that the update will offer more personalized, faster ways to play and place greater emphasis on up-and-coming titles. Now available on Galaxy devices, with further updates planned, the new hub wants to be a more active space for the latest mobile games. "We believe that gamers want to find new co...

item.title: Best Packing Cubes for Every Kind of Trip (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Whether you’re a no-frills backpacker or a bag-checking fashionista, there’s a perfect packing cube out there for you.

item.title: How one startup is using prebiotics to try and ease the copper shortage
item.description: Transition Metal Solutions is applying a special cocktail to coax microbes into unlocking more copper from ore.

item.title: US senators demand answers from X, Meta, Alphabet and others on sexualized deepfakes
item.description: In a letter to the leaders of X, Meta, Alphabet, Snap, Reddit and TikTok, several U.S. senators are demanding the companies provide proof that they have "robust protections and policies" in place, and how they plan to curb the rise of sexualized deepfakes on their platforms.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Friday, January 16 (game #1453)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: 'Any use of AI tools to impersonate other artists or styles is strictly prohibited': Bandcamp just showed Spotify how easy it is to ban AI slop
item.description: Bandcamp just showed Spotify how it's done, banning 'any use of AI tools to impersonate other artists or styles'

item.title: PS5 Pro : une mise à jour massive va débrider la console avant le mois de mars
item.description: La PS5 Pro n'a pas encore tout montré. D'ici quelques semaines, Sony devrait déployer le PSSR 2.0, une évolution majeure de son IA capable de doubler la fluidité des jeux et d'améliorer vos vieux titres.

item.title: Roblox's age verification system is reportedly a trainwreck
item.description: Roblox's age-verification system was designed as a response to allegations it has a child predator problem. Less than a week in, how's it going? Well, Wired reported on Tuesday that, in some cases, it's classifying children as adults and adults as children. So, not so great!Last week, Roblox made age verification mandatory for anyone using the platform's chat feature. That process involves either submitting a facial age estimate via selfie or (optionally for anyone 13 or older) uploading a government ID check. After verifying, you can only chat with groups of players around your age.The move c...

item.title: Hyperpop PS5 controller and console cover pre-orders build-up — all the best links ahead of the new DualSense and faceplate collection dropping tomorrow
item.description: We've got all the best information and links for Sony's latest addition to its suite of PS5 controllers and console covers: the Hyperopop Collection.

item.title: Ces 3 opérateurs mobiles vont facturer la résiliation de leurs forfaits, vers la fin du changement gratuit ?
item.description: Emboîtant le pas à B&YOU, trois autres opérateurs de téléphonie mobile annoncent l'arrivée de frais de résiliation sur leurs forfaits sans engagement.
